website_summaries.verdict: Stubborn messes are no match for the pressure this diaper sprayer provides.
pros: Comfortable grip and plenty of pressure
cons: A shorter flex line between the valve and toilet tank provides the best results

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Diaper Sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I love that just by a turn of a valve you can adjust the pressure of the water! INSTALLATION was a breeze! My husband had to add some sort of "tape" to the inside of the screw that attaches to the toilet so that it stays extra tight. It is IMPORTANT to make sure you SHUT OFF the valve to the sprayer when not In use and to make sure you empty out all the water out of the hose when you are done. This will INCREASE the life of your sprayer!
customer_reviews.author: ReneeV

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: We've cloth diapered multiple children and never saw the need for a diaper sprayer... but having 2 in cloth full time changed our minds. I can't believe we waited so long. This sprayer takes care of even the worst spoiled diaper in a few seconds where other methods take much longer. It's also more effective, literally blasting off the poo, which makes washing easier and reduces smells until laundry time. The sprayer itself is very quick and easy topp install (takes less than 5 minutes) and seems to be very durable. The only issue we had was the holster being upside down on the hook (a simple mistake and quick fix).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The product works like advertised I use it as a bum gun to wash my rear after dropping a duece. It was very easy to install didn't even need any tools I like that it had extra rubber washers . don't over tighten I tightened it to hand tight and no leaks so far (one month later by the time of this review). The only negative I can think of is the why I din't buy this sooner even the package was sturdy and easy to open good job lads and good job by their Q.C. department!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cloth Diapering Must Have
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our cloth diapering system before we had our son. My husband installed the sprayer easily and with no problems, and it can be switched from one side of the toilet to the other without hassle. It has been absolutely crucial in cleaning our diapers— however the spray is so strong that I recommend purchasing some sort of shield so that the mess is contained to the toilet! Otherwise you may be cleaning your whole bathroom. Good value for the price and definitely critical to have if you are cloth diapering.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is all metal, no plastic parts, easy to install and does the job. It has a valve at an easy to reach location that allows you toggle down the spray or turn it completely off. Being all metal is important as it is a pressurized water line when not in use. I am ready for the next toilet paper shortage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing half of the Package.... Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for me and my wife we have a new baby on the way the package did not have the sprayer handle in it... It only had the hose and the Valve....... Totally useless as it sits. I really hope the seller contacts me back to take care of this I would gladly update my review if they do but as of now was a total waste of money.....
customer_reviews.author: estakin

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazing until a few weeks ago when the handle got ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this in July and I was so excited, I could finally spray the poop off our cloth diapers instead of scraping it... Worked amazing until a few weeks ago when the handle got stuck in a weird position while I was spraying and took me 5 mins to get it back into the correct position to stop spraying... then this morning, while cleaning the poops, it totally broke off in my hand! I've got a whole bag of poop diapers I still need to spray, can you help a momma out?? The metal bar inside looks to not have been placed correctly and pulled off... ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Athena Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: BAD PARTS
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to share some feedback... we purchased this item to assist in using/cleaning cloth diapers for a newborn. My husband went to install, instructions were clear but there was SO much leaking. The gasket that was included was inappropriately sized, which we believe led to the leaking. He had to go to the store to purchase a different size and then it installed no leaking. Just unfortunate that for a new item, it required an entire trip to the store for a part (and this was after 2 days of him fighting with it trying to figure out what was causing the leak). Oh well... now we will see how it works day to day.
customer_reviews.author: Keren Garfinkel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install, cool water helps soothe mommy's postpartum bathroom times. I find the sprayer is not too harsh for bidet and not too soft for use as cloth diaper sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: YaMare

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: First shipment had no spray head, second has a leaky spray head. PSI in the house is normal. Spray head doesn't even fit in holster.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: No leaking, great build.
customer_reviews.text: Needed one for the new house. This is the second one I bought and the quality is outstanding! The trigger is made of metal too. I highly recommend this product. Leak free!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but could use improvements
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this sprayer and would buy it again BUT there could be some improvements. The latch to hang up the sprayer is too small.... so I often leave it dangling off the side of the toilet. The water valve is finicky and can be difficult to get good pressure. But once strong pressure is found, this sprayer is awesome. We use the spray pal shield with this and it makes poo clean up so much easier than before.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a lot!
customer_reviews.text: When we had it hooked up it seemed nice enough. Easy to use and nice pressure. However it leaked a ton and we tried everything to get it to stop and had two different handymen who have completed many plumbing projects try to stop the leaking, to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Just be careful while installing so you don't have to buy new flex hoses again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the button likes to come unhinged and stay in spraying mode. It's not hard to put it back in position to shut it off now, but the first time required me shutting off the water supply until I could figure it out. Also, the metal connection to the tank/water supply line will easily cross thread the plastic hose connections found on your toilet. I recommend threading the flex hose on before you connect it to the tank. Overall, it works great. Definitely a good purchase for anyone doing cloth diapering.
customer_reviews.author: Badwella

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Ok for cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Easy to install, took 15 mins. Bought for cloth diaper cleaning and it *mostly* works. Gets the big debris off but doesn't agitate the cloth enough to really get everything loose. If I turned it up full blast it just sprays everywhere. I still have to dunk and scrub certain messes. I use with the spray pal, which is not perfect either but does the trick we'll enough to keep going.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! Leaks, leaks, leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on July 5th and it’s now August 6th. We’ve had noting but problems. Everytime we’ve think we got it rigged to not leak, water starts shooting out. I would not recommended. My husband is at his wits end with this product. I did a lot of research before purchasing and I’m just so disappointed. In one month every aspect of this sprayer has leaked in some way.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have two of these (one for each bathroom), and they were very easy to install, the spray pressure is really good, and we are more than pleased with them! Makes cloth diapering way easier!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great, but attach round end of hose to nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Would have been a ten minute installation, but as we were wrapping up we discovered that the ends of the hose are actually different, which is not indicated on the instructions on the box. Initially, the hose was leaking at the connection to the nozzle. Luckily the company had sent me additional instructions (now I see why!) that the round end of the hose needs to be near the nozzle to allow for it to rest in the holder...or to not have it leak. Hopefully this will be changed soon so a ten minute installation can be had for all. Will update once I use it on diapers.
customer_reviews.author: CSEGS

customer_reviews.title: It’s got power!
customer_reviews.text: Holy water pressure! This thing can throw quite a jet, you can adjust the pressure by adjusting the valve. My husband said it was easy to install. Based on other reviews we always close the valve when not in use for fear of leaking and we have not had any leaks
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to amazon

customer_reviews.title: The best cloth diaper sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Whoever invented this is awesome. This thing is serious. I use it to spray off my cloth diapers. It can be a little strong so you just have to get used to using it so you don't splash poop everywhere. Otherwise it sprays off the diapers awesome.There's probably a way to adjust the pressure but I haven't figured it out. I hated just trying to swish the diapers in the toilet to clean them. I feel it didn't do a good job cleaning them and it was messy. I recommend this to anyone who uses cloth diapers and doesn't want to swish them in the toilet. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl at Last

customer_reviews.title: I can safely say that it also works great. It takes a little getting used to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself when I was 38 weeks pregnant, as a surprise for my husband who was working on another baby prep task on his long list of baby prep. I've never done anything remotely related to plumbing, so if I could successfully do it in well under an hour, you know it's not difficult. Now that we've used it for cleaning off our cloth diapers, I can safely say that it also works great. It takes a little getting used to the adjustable spray pressure, but a little trial and error is not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Hand-held bidet
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the hand-held bidet. It was very easy to install and easy to use. After some adjustment with the pressure I have the setting to a comfortable level. It isn't the same experience as a full bidet but it is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T

customer_reviews.title: This makes cloth diapers worth considering
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and has great flow. This is great for our cloth diapers. Just spray the poo into the toilet and toss the cloth into the basket until you got a load.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Cloth Diapering
customer_reviews.text: Must have for cloth diapering! Recently traveled for five days and brought it with me and it was so easy to install and uninstall.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I am a plumber so Im very picky about any kind of fixture This is definitely a high quality sprayer. Honestly, the first one I've tried but, heavy duty, real brass. I haven't installed it yet so, I can't speak to the spraying power but, I'm sure it's great. So much of that depends on your water pressure anyway.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyBHill01

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer does make it a lot easier to clean our diapers, but man is it powerful. You have to have a careful thumb or you will jet poopy water all over your bathroom. Also, remember to turn of the switch after each use. It WILL LEAK if you forget.
customer_reviews.author: rgeorg10

customer_reviews.title: Cloth Diapering? You can get by without one, ...
customer_reviews.text: Cloth Diapering? You can get by without one, but in my opinion, this is a necessity for me to make it though the cloth diapering process through all the different stages. It was really helpful to have during the potty training process as well. This one works flawlessly, and is much cheaper than some of the other leading brands!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Mama

customer_reviews.title: Installation was quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this type of sprayer because I had used similar sprayers in Spain and Morocco. I found them to be effective and efficient. The only tool needed for installation was a pair of pliers and a screwdriver. I took off the hook for the toilet tank and mounted the sprayer on the wall for easier access. We used much less TP now. I recommend short bursts rather than continuous spray. Why spend hundreds on a fancy toilet seat?
customer_reviews.author: LeftCoast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Picked this one only because it was one of the top rated ones on Amazon that fit my budget. Holds up completely with its high ratings! Excellent water pressure, easy to install and it gets the poo off 100% better than I was able to do with just the sink before by hand. I'm going to use this to rinse off baby's clothes too if we ever get a blow out - which so far with cloth, we haven't *happy dance* - I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: TurtleGym

customer_reviews.title: Handheld Bidet
customer_reviews.text: Nice bidet sprayer. I removed one star because it really need a plumbers tape and I wished it was included. had to buy separately. Otherwise, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: cool_guy

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a good quality and durable diaper sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we don't have any huge complaints. It seems like a good quality and durable diaper sprayer. The pressure of the sprayer adjusts easily, however thr sprayer would be more effective if the spray was more like that of a sink sprayer. We had a sprayer in the past that was like this and did an excellent job at spraying sticky poop off the diaper. This sprayer has good pressure, but it tends to just soak the diaper instead of helping to remove super mashed in poop. Overall though, it works well and we don't plan on replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine B

customer_reviews.title: needs better directions and splatter shield
customer_reviews.text: annoying to set up, the instructions aren't that great. it also says make sure a washer is in every spot, but don't do that or you will block the water from going through. make sure you look carefully because one spot does NOT get a washer on it. as far as using it, it gets the poop off but you WILL need a splatter shield because it sprays hard and will get stuff all over your bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this diaper sprayer four stars because although it works phenomenally it was a pain in the butt to install. It took us almost an hour to get it to fit on properly due to plastic to metal fittings. Once it was installed (the first time) we had some leaking. We turned the valves off installed it again but this time using plumbers tape and the seal is tight now. This is so much more convenient and cleaner then doing the toilet dunking thing!
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, no leaks and great water pressure. Pretty good looking too, as these things go. Only thing to note was that it requires a flexible hose between the toilet tank and the water valve on the wall. Ours was rigid, but it was very easy to just buy a flexible hose at a hardware store and install it along with the sprayer. Having done cloth diapers with and without a sprayer, I strongly believe that they are worth the money, and this one seems to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to spray cloth diapers it works great my only complaint is that it doesn't fit in the holder at all so it just hangs there.
customer_reviews.author: Halie

customer_reviews.title: It's VERY OK.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd diaper sprayer, and it's not nearly as nice as the first one (Aqquos I believe was the brand). The follow-up and customer satisfaction requests were persistent, and helpful, but unfortunately the sprayer just isn't that good, comparatively. The sprayer is not very flexible, and the valve has a lot of 'play' in it, meaning you have to open the valve halfway, vs. being entirely open or closed. At any rate, it's difficult to explain, and I'm not thrilled with the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cloth diapering
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cloth diapering. I would recommend getting a pail to hold the diaper over versus the toilet. It makes it a lot less messy when using the sprayer. I love that you can adjust the pressure and turn it on and off so the little ones don't soak everything. I'm very pleased that it was easy to install and it does not leak at all and its been several months. This product is a must need for anyone who is using cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Takes some practice but an awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product, it is so much easier than swishing diapers. It takes some practice, I made some messes for a good 3 weeks until I mastered the exact method that worked for me. The only design flaw is it recommends emptying the sprayer after each use which means you have to turn the dial off and you lose the perfect spot of where that dial need to be to clean the diaper and not make a huge mess. But once you use it regularly, you get the hang of it and it gets easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Collins

customer_reviews.title: Poor Water Pressure
customer_reviews.text: We are quite unhappy with this and will be returning it. Most importantly, it doesn't have sufficient water pressure to rinse a poopy diaper. Based on the reviews, I can only assume people have never had a "good" diaper sprayer, so assumed this one was adequate. In addition to poor pressure at the sprayer, the unit restricts flow to the toilet, causing it fill slowly. As well, the "switch" allows you to turn off water to the toilet, which is a very strange design. Previously we had a second hand plastic sprayer which delivered much better results. Stay clear of this one.
customer_reviews.author: HamBone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: This review is mainly for installation and first few uses. The Bumworks Handheld Bidet works very well. There is a handle that increases or reduces the pressure which is a great feature. Our toilet it in a corner so it was hard to fit and install in that sense but the overall installation procedure was very easy. I would recommend this to anyone using cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Hora

customer_reviews.title: My first Bidet ❤️❤️❤️!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Bidet!!! Easy to install no tools required. Strong water spray. I definitely recommend you buy this. I'm trekking ask my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Le Le

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this sprayer for two weeks. It took my husband less than 10 minutes to complete the installation. The sprayer is performing as expected. I'm only giving 4 stars because I wish there was an option for shower spray and jet spray, like on a garden hose. Our little one has very sticky poo and a jet option would be helpful! Overall I'm pleased with the performance and the price.
customer_reviews.author: ConscientiousMomma16

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift but my daughter has the same one which is great! Hers was easy to install and is quite handy when using cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived on time and well protected. The sprayer required no tools, included all necessary parts, had very clear instructions, and was easy to install. I did it myself, and required no help from my husband. The water pressure to the sprayer is adjustable, so you can really crank it up to get the solids off the cloth diapers. Our baby just started eating solids, which is a real game changer when it comes to cloth diapers. I hope this will help us continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Why spend thousands of dollars buying toilet paper, using disposable diapers, and cutting down all those trees!
customer_reviews.text: Used as a personal bidet, it washes the private parts, getting you cleaner than just wiping with a wad of toilet paper. You keep a small personal finger towel nearby to dry off with and toss in wash daily. Your under garments stay cleaner. No more wads of toilet paper clogging toilet. If used for rinsing a recyclable cloth diaper, it is better for the environment, and the money saved can start your child's college fund. Andrea from PA
customer_reviews.author: Handy Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but leaks under washer
customer_reviews.text: The spray pressure is amazing and it works the way it should, but it leaks under the washer where it connects to the toilet tank. I have switched seals, tried plumbers tape, and tried different combinations of everything. It still leaks and I’m having to unhook it every time I use it so it doesn’t ruin our bathroom floor. I’ll be sending it back for a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy instillation
customer_reviews.text: Instillation is quick and easy. Very simple steps no tools need. Took me roughly 5 minutes from out of the box to running with no leaks. Spray head has a very strong pressure of water when turned on all the way. Toilet will still work perfectly normal even if you forget to turn off valve to sprayer. Is an excellent spray for price when all you need it for is to get the poop of your lovely adorable cloth dippers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: The Dirty Details
customer_reviews.text: I hate that you have to hold the sprayer trigger down while turning the dial to turn it on. Trying to hold a poopy diaper and not spray water all over the bathroom is enough to focus on when using a product like this. I do love how sturdy the sprayer is and the spray intensity is great. The product seems to be very high quality. After breaking another sprayer that we had for more than 3 years, that's an important feature to me.
customer_reviews.author: CCintheD

customer_reviews.title: Strong sprayer, no leaks, perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and haven’t had any issues with leaking. I love how powerful the sprayer is for cleaning our cloth diapers. I do wish the hose was a little bit longer so I could occasionally spray out in the tub but it works great for what I needed! I definitely recommend some type of spray guard as this is quite powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good finish.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased for another bathroom. Based on my experience of my earlier purchase, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Saif

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great company, would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast, product came exactly as described. The reasons I did not rate 5 stars are the water pressure is not quite as strong as I'd like (though this may be just the plumbing of our house), and the installation was not as simple as shown in the help video. I needed both rubber washers in order to make a tight enough fit to prevent leaks. Still, these experiences may just be unique to mine and I would purchase the product again. It is very helpful not having to use a sink to spray off the diapers and this does the job well enough.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this product. I got emails before and after shipping explaining everything about it in great detail, and notes asking if I have any problems to contact them. That normally means great costomer service but I cannot comment on that as I am in love with this sprayer. At 9 months pregnant I put it together in less than 15 minutes. It works well, has strong water pressure (when we figured out where to turn the dial to get the most water through), and looks and feels like great quality. All in all, I adore this and am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as the interim solution until the utility sink was installed. Works well, only complaint is that accessing the valve requires getting to the connection at the inlet to the toilet tank. Not the most convenient point to access in our bathroom layout. Plenty of power to hose down most things, use it to hose down any dirty buckets as well since the spray works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan123

customer_reviews.title: It was VERY easy to put together and install on our toilet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to spray off our cloth diapers. It was VERY easy to put together and install on our toilet. The spray has a strong force and is easy to turn the handle for the water to be on or off. My favorite part is the way it looks. The metal has stayed super shiny and it doesn't look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper sprayer! Upon purchasing, I received an email from Kaydee Baby with a link to an installation YouTube video, as well as a detailed pdf with tips for getting the best results from this sprayer. It was super easy to install after watching the video and so far has been working great! I've had NO leaks and the pressure is completely adjustable, which is great! I cannot believe how great this is for this price! I would recommend this sprayer to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl in Memphis

customer_reviews.title: Functional - Well made
customer_reviews.text: Happy to report that this was easy to install and use. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Henson

customer_reviews.title: A Gift
customer_reviews.text: I know it was received. However, it was a baby shower gift, so I have no personal experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Pressure control and on/ off is difficult
customer_reviews.text: I’m not excited about this product. It hasn’t enough control with the pressure of water coming out if the hose. It’s either way too strong or not strong enough pressure. I don’t like that I have to stick my hand under the toilet to control the on/ off switch and try to adjust the pressure either.
customer_reviews.author: MS. MCM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought this would be a waist as. I could just swoosh the diaper in the toilet with a few flushes. Well I just didn't want to do that. The spray is powerful. And cleans my sons fluff perfectly. My husband actually smiled when he used it. I also use it to spray clean my shower walls after a bleaching since it's right there. Also it's very easy to install. Love it. And it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it does exactly what it says. It is definitely a time saver and saves me some disgust when it comes to cleaning my babys cloth diapers. I dont have to clean them in a gross bucket anymore lol. The only thing I'm not a fan of is that there is alittle splash back which starts to go away alittle with some practice. Obviously there will always be some splast back with these kinds of products being used for cloth diaper cleaning. Overall, I really like this sprayer and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them. Both arrived on time. Thought this would be a good investment instead of buying and hoarding toilet paper - and it really is. Easy to install and use. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RPW

customer_reviews.title: This sprayer makes cloth diapering incredibly easy! I'm using the spray pal insert that sits ...
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer makes cloth diapering incredibly easy! I'm using the spray pal insert that sits down in my toilet in combination with this sprayer. My diapers look clean after spraying them off and look brand new after each wash. My baby is exclusively breastfed and I spray off each diaper after it is soiled, usually within a few hours, then they go into a diaper pail and are machine washed every other day. I highly recommend this product for parents using cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: brocksrock

customer_reviews.title: I like that you can adjust the water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Installed this to use for rinsing cloth diapers in the toilet; I like that you can adjust the water pressure. It cleans easily and can practically clean a diaper with the right amount of pressure. When on it's hook, it's out of the way and stays close to the toilet (so it's not sticking out). Glad I purchased this!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson's

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY LEAKED AFTER TWO MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality the hose started leaking after a couple of months with very little use, checked it hoping it was loose but no, it was just bad quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Caraza

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product surprised me! It's a great quality metal brass sprayer. The force of water coming out was surprising as well. Great for what we need it for. The only thing I'd say is that our toilet takes a little longer to fill back up. But that's not a reason to pass this up by any means. Also the company has sent me two very well thought out emails saying they stand behind their product 100%. It's just a nice reminder that not everyone is out to take your money and run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! We got this sprayer last week
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We got this sprayer last week. It was very easy to install and to use. In order to get the best pressure, I press on the sprayer head while moving the valve opening stick, otherwise is hard to tell until I have enough experience with it, I suppose. One thing I should mention is that using this through a Vermont winter, the sprayer can get uncomfortably frigid.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: A great tool that makes cloth diapering easier
customer_reviews.text: So worth it. I find cloth diapering to be no more trouble than disposable. I and my wife are certain this sprayer helps with that impression and would not want to be without it. The Spray Pal splash shield is also money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Goat

customer_reviews.title: Too strong of a spray
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy for my husband to install. The sprayer has either a very weak spray or very strong causing waste to get all over the place and your bathroom ends up soaking wet. I kept it just because I didn't want to bother returning and buying a new one. Worth researching and looking for a different sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful spray
customer_reviews.text: Set mine up this week on utility sink in basement, it's very powerful. I think after the cloth diapering I will keep it on sink. I used a Dixon BMA974 brass fitting to hook up the the garden hose splitter for washing machine hose. Put a little Teflon tape on the threads.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Installs fast
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, and it was installed within probably less than 10 minutes but I was really hoping for a higher power since I'm using this to rinse off cloth diapers. It doesn't leak but the only reason for the two stars is because I wanted a higher power for my diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and fabulous customer service. It was super easy and fast to install and works great! Edited to add: The nozzle suddenly wouldn't turn off when you let go. I contacted the company and they sent a replacement right away along with a follow up email to make sure our problem was fixed. I'm super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J Paradise

customer_reviews.title: I installed it and it was a breeze with good directions and all the parts
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for cloth diapering and it works as advertised. I installed it and it was a breeze with good directions and all the parts. I try to avoid having to use it, but I have used it and it works well. It has a pretty powerful stream that can create some splatter. Not really a fault of the item, just the concept of cleaning diapers out in the toilet itself.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Overton

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, without any leaks
customer_reviews.text: The handle is ergonomic, is easy to hold and feels solid in my hand. The water pressure is regulated by the T valve down where the water line is connected and needs to be open less than a quarter to deliver spray with enough pressure that is comfortable. Anything over a quarter is going to be painful :)
customer_reviews.author: adived

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: While it's spraying, it's fine. When you let go of the trigger, it starts to leak down the hose. I tried every combination of washers, along with some Teflon tape.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia's mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I really love this diaper sprayer! I cloth diaper my little newborn and it has come in handy! The pressure is great! It's easy to install and easy to use, I love that it comes with a little holder to keep up attached to the toilet. It really does the job well! I love it and highly recommend it to my fellow cloth diaper mamas and anyone else too!
customer_reviews.author: ConJam

customer_reviews.title: It works great and has a great amount of pressure
customer_reviews.text: If you are doing cloth diapers, this is a must have! It is so cheap for the amount of time and hassle it saves you. It works great and has a great amount of pressure. Please note: if you have a straight pipe (doesnt bend or move) then you will have to replace it with a pipe that bends or you cannot install. Luckily my father was able to do this fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Audria Leader

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done. the spray is really strong ...
customer_reviews.text: gets the job done. the spray is really strong and harder to control than on the other model we had before this one, but you get used to it and can always adjust from the water line. the only other thing to note is to always make sure the lever clicks entirely back into place when you're done using it--i've had other family members not realize it wasn't back in place and got quite the surprise (and a wet bathroom) when i turned the water on the next time!
customer_reviews.author: rose n g

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn't screw onto my toilet. I thought my ...
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't screw onto my toilet. I thought my toilet was defective so I took it to my moms to test it, it didn't work there either. They sent me a replacement part but same issues.
customer_reviews.author: BIKA

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bidet, though I do wish it could adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bidet, though I do wish it could adjust water pressure. No leaking so far. I've taken other reviews into account, and check periodically to make sure there isn't any, and I haven't experienced any leaking at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bulger

customer_reviews.title: What toilet paper?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! A little loosening and tightening necessary to make sure there’s no leaking but that’s how you do with all plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Brown

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I was rinsing in the toilet by hand before and it was taking FOREVER and hurting my back leaning over. Finally I went with this sprayer and it made a world if difference. Great quality, very easy to assemble (did it myself) and no other tools required. It's one of my favorite purchases by far.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 6 months now and couldn't be happier with it. The build quality is amazing and the water pressure is really great. Best investment for cleaning cloth diapers. You also need to pair up one of those plasic shields that go in the toilet and the diaper clips to it so that you don't make a mess when cleaning the diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Won't install
customer_reviews.text: This says it fits standard American toilets, but we could not get this to install properly at all. Not worth the time, effort or headache trying to get this thing to work.
customer_reviews.author: MEmbick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good quality sprayer and as long as you have good water pressure it sprays off pretty much everything that you would want to the only thing that's plastic about it is the hook to hang it on the back of the toilet everything else is metal
customer_reviews.author: Tangerine Munro

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic diaper sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy install. After our first diaper sprayer broke (three years and a three year old later) we were in need of a new one. I bought this one and it is the best I've used! Very easy install and great water distribution. Sleek finish, too. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaja S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product & great price! This is the one you want! Make the purchase!! lol
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, excellent product!! I read a lot of reviews before purchasing & this one was the best & for the best price also! Super easy to install. The seller also sends you an email with a PDF of tips & tricks. It was very handy & we did have to reference it once (we put the wrong nut on one spot lol). Partner this with the Aquas Spraymate & you're golden!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs instruction video
customer_reviews.text: Has great water pressure had some difficulty putting it on but it was just user error. A video would be nice. I use it for cloth diapers and it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Smyer

customer_reviews.title: much lower water pressure than I expected an the valve ...
customer_reviews.text: much lower water pressure than I expected an the valve isn't an on/off it is a off/on/off with a 'just' right position needed for the most pressure. I built one from pieces at a local hardware store for about the same price. When we moved I didn't take it with me. I should have it blew this thing out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Easy installation requiring no tools.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does, and it doesn't affect the function of the toilet. Installation is easy. I haven't had a chance to use it on diapers yet, but I used it just to test it out after installing it, and it worked great. The water pressure is also adjustable. On full blast, it has a lot of pressure, but it is easy to adjust it down a little.
customer_reviews.author: derrick81787

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great company
customer_reviews.text: Best sprayer I have found. Super easy to install. No leaks. Love that you can adjust the sprayer pressure. Beautiful finish and strong parts. I can see myself using it for years. Never have to touch you know what again! I use it to rinse out soiled diapers and to clean off my older child's potty seat. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: If it's leaking flip your hose.
customer_reviews.text: Took us a bit to figure out why it was leaking, but there is in fact a correct direction to install the hose (even with the rubber rings), once you figure out what that is you should be fine. We were less than impressed with the directions. It has a very strong spray, keep close to the bowl so you don't splash everything in sight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: After install, this thing leaked from the t section like a seive, even with copious amounts of plumbers tape
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband who does happen to be a handyman less than 10 minutes to install. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Mae Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install, functions well and seems like high quality. Have only tested it once or twice so far. Note on the install: Following the instructions seems to lead to too many rubber compression gaskets to get the connections fully threaded, so I left them out (each of the connections already had one inside). Added a little plumber's tape for good measure but I don't think those things would leak anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Unusable, always leaks
customer_reviews.text: Try as I might, I cannot get this product to stop leaking. Their customer service was very helpful in replacing what I thought was a faulty part, but the replacement has the same problem. I've tried on three occasions, and my handy-man father-in-law also tried unsuccessfully. Always it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high-powered!
customer_reviews.text: We got another one first, due to glowing reviews. The water pressure just wasn't there. This one, though, has no problems in the pressure department. In fact, the first time I used it, I had it cranked too high. We all know how that ends up! Definitely buy this if it's what you're in the market for.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Melford

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for the tidal wave
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install and maintain, though it seems to have only two settings: trickle and fire hose strength. It was tough to find an inbetween and often took several adjustments to not scatter poop around the bathroom. Pair it with a SprayPal and it isn't so messy. Wouldn't do cloth diapers without it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sprayer. Easy to attach and install to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprayer. Easy to attach and install to the toilet and a very good amount of water pressure. My only complaint is that the handle doesn't sit well in the holder. I am currently looking for another holder option as the holder is just not working for us at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Three kids later and we finally got this gem. Before we would soak poopy diapers in a bucket in the tub and dump it in the toilet...gross! This is so nice, very luxurious and high powered for spraying turds straight into the potty! A must for cloth diaper adviocates!!!
customer_reviews.author: msanalog

customer_reviews.title: High quality, fair price
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit tricky to install, but nothing a YouTube video couldn't solve. I like that the holder hooks onto the toilet lid rather than needing to be mounted/nail anything to the wall. A diaper sprayer is definitely a must have for cloth diapering & this one is high quality, fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Goodwin

product_meta.title: Bumworks Handheld Bidet Cloth Diaper Sprayer for Toilet | Bum Gun Butt Washer, Hand Held Bidet Hose Attachment Water Jet Spray Set | Baday Toilet Kit (Bedit Toilet Badae Biday Boday Toilet Seat)
product_meta.description:
Color:3-Way ValveBumworks high end hand bidet for toilet is made of brass with a chrome finish. The hose has a stainless steel case with an EPDM inner tube which increases longevity. The ultra sturdy brass T-valve is essential for strong water pressure.

INSTRUCTIONS:

10 minute installation, no tools required. If you have a flexible water supply line our T-valve will easily integrate between the supply line and toilet intake valve. Simply turn off the water supply, flush the toilet, and unscrew the water supply line from the toilet. Place the T-valve between the toilet intake and water supply line. Attach your hose and nozzle and that's it!
